sentences.sentence: The farmer expects the software to tell him whether he will have to replant any parts of his farm fields.
sentences.translation: 这位农民希望该软件告诉他农田是否有区域需要重新播种。

sentences.sentence: They have to replant the seedbeds as soon as possible.
sentences.translation: 他们必须尽快在苗床上重新培育上新苗。

sentences.sentence: We had to replant after the drought.
sentences.translation: 旱灾之后我们只得重新再种。
